      • saveImage

        public static void saveImage(java.lang.String imageUrl,
                             java.lang.String destinationFile,
                             javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        imageUrl - the URL of the image
        destinationFile - the destination file
        imageView - the image container in the window
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when problems displaying the image

        Saves the image found on the article. If there is no images, nothing will happen
